content:
The tours of the Tokyo National Stadium are typically offered daily, except on certain days when the stadium may be hosting an event or undergoing maintenance. 

The tours usually take around 60-90 minutes, and visitors are accompanied by a knowledgeable guide who provides information about the stadium's history, design, and facilities. 

As for the cost, the fees for the tours vary depending on the type of tour and the time of year. Typically, the general tour costs around 1,000 yen (approximately $10 USD) for adults and 500 yen (approximately $5 USD) for children. There may also be additional fees for special tours or tours during peak times.

It's always best to check with the stadium directly or with a travel agency for the most up-to-date information on tour availability, pricing, and schedules.
